Title: Relic Hunters: Two Presets, Two Intricate Weapons & a Pet -mecha
Description:
Adds:
A Relic Hunter adventurer preset.

Another Relic Hunter as a Plant-Person (inspired by Fern: a grass-made counterpart of Fin the Human).

A pet, Jake the Dog, featuring a suit-armor mode —just like in the series (He acts as a mini-mecha).

And two new custom weapons with interesting details to make them unique, diferent, and keep them balanced, currently in the possession of Jake the Dog!​ (He also has some of your relic-hunting gadgets)
